'''''A Glimpse Into the Pale Night''''' is a World Quest in [[Enkanomiya]].

==Steps==
# Examine the [[Inscribed Map]]
#* [[Map]] of Enkanomiya becomes visible.

==Gameplay Notes==
* Completing this quest will grant the {{Achievement|"...You Do Not Know the Night..."}}

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|You decide to investigate the "map carving" in front of you...}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Paimon:''' If those memories are correct, this middle patch should be where that lighthouse was.
:'''Paimon:''' In that case, we should be down... here, right?
:'''Paimon:''' Anyway, it's always easier to have a map with us.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Trivia==
* {{Lang|"Pale Night"|ja=白夜|ja_lit=white night}} may be referring to {{Lang|Byakuyakoku|ja=白夜国|ja_rm=Byakuyakoku|ja_tl=Land of the White Night}}, the original name of [[Enkanomiya]].
** In Chinese, Japanese, Korean, and Vietnamese, the name of the quest shares the "pale night" portion with the respective name for Byakuyakoku.
